# Blinds and Curtains Dubai

> The most trusted provider of custom-made window treatments in Dubai with over a decade of industry experience.

## About the Company
Blinds and Curtains Dubai (blindsandcurtains.ae) specializes in high-quality, made-to-measure window dressings for residential and commercial properties. Known for a "Zero Pressure" appointment guarantee and industry-leading turnaround times.

## Core Services
- **Free In-Home Consultation**: Experts bring 20–30 fabric books directly to your doorstep for selection and professional measurement.
- **Instant Quotes**: Real-time pricing provided during the home visit or over the phone.
- **Fast Turnaround**: Production and installation completed in as little as 1-2 days.
- **Professional Installation**: In-house team ensures precision fitting for all products.
- **5-Year Warranty**: Long-term quality guarantee on products and services.

## Product Categories

### Custom Curtains
- **Styles**: Ripple Fold, Triple Pinch Pleat, Eyelet, Wave, and Box Pleated.
- **Types**: Blackout (ideal for bedrooms), Sheer (light-filtering), and Decorative fabrics.
- **Automation**: Full motorization options compatible with Smart Home systems (Alexa, Google Home).

### Blinds
- **Roller Blinds**: Available in Blackout, Sunscreen, and Duo-fabric (Zebra) styles.
- **Roman Blinds**: Luxury fabric folds for a classic interior look.
- **Venetian & Wooden Blinds**: Real wood, faux wood, and aluminum options.
- **Vertical & Panel Blinds**: Perfect for large windows and sliding doors.

### Specialty Solutions
- **Shutters**: Durable and stylish plantation-style shutters.
- **Commercial Projects**: Specialized solutions for offices, hotels, schools, and hospitals.

- **Website**: https://blindsandcurtains.ae

- **Working Hours**: 8:30 AM – 11:00 PM, 7 days a week.

## Key Differentiators
- 4.9/5 Star Rating with 800+ verified reviews.
- 18,000+ happy customers across the UAE.
- In-house production facility ensuring strict 13-step quality control.
